00215         protected function createPage($username=NULL, $password=NULL, $id=NULL, $loginToken = NULL, $editToken = NULL, $title=NULL, $text=NULL, $summary=NULL){
00216                 $__pcpServer = new PCPServer();
00217                 $__userCredentials = new PCPUserCredentials($username, $password, $id, $loginToken, $editToken);
00218                 $__pcpServer->login($__userCredentials);
00219                 return $__pcpServer->createPage($__userCredentials,$title, $text, $summary);
00220         }
00221 
00234         protected function readPage($username=NULL, $password=NULL, $id=NULL, $loginToken = NULL, $editToken = NULL, $title= NULL, $revisionID = NULL){
00235                 $__pcpServer = new PCPServer();
00236                 $__userCredentials = new PCPUserCredentials($username, $password, $id, $loginToken, $editToken);
00237                 $__pcpServer->login($__userCredentials);
00238                 return $__pcpServer->readPage($__userCredentials,$title, $revisionID)->toHashmap();
00239         }
